metadata.title: CVE-2024-36468 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The reported vulnerability is a stack buffer overflow in thezbx_snmp_cache_handle_engineid function within the Zabbix server/proxycode. This issue occurs when copying data from session->securityEngineID tolocal_record.engineid without proper bounds checking.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
